alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 2:14PM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds will be increasing tonight, with sustained winds 35 to 50 mph and gusts 65 to 80 mph expected. Strongest winds will be on exposed beaches and headlands, with timing of strongest winds from 8 am to 2 pm Tuesday. Winds will become westerly later in the afternoon, and gradually ease Tuesday evening. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, re5main in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
